uid.placeholder: leave empty to generate a random uid by meilisearch

description.placeholder: add optional description for your key

indexes.placeholder: select or type index (e.g., movies_* or *)
indexes.tip: Select existing indexes or type custom patterns (e.g., movies_* or *). Leave empty for all indexes.

actions.tip: Leave this option empty means all actions permitted

expiresAt.placeholder: !!UTC!! time and format must be YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss
expiresAt.tip: Leave this option empty means this key never expires

delete.title: Delete this key
delete.tip: Are you sure you want to delete this key?

create.title: Add new key
